EmailTemplate.description: This is Created as a Part of NOKIASC-36144
EmailTemplate.name: CH Case Owner Email Notification Alert
EmailTemplate.subject: New customer email notification. Support Ticket Number {!CH_EmailAlert__c.CH_Bind2__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: {!CH_EmailAlert__c.CH_Bind1__c} has sent an email to Support ticket {!CH_EmailAlert__c.CH_Bind2__c} : "{!CH_EmailAlert__c.CH_Bind3__c}". Please read it and respond appropriately by clicking on the link .
